element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the average of all the cells located uphill of each cell.

element.name: DEM
element.text: Digital Elevation Model. This should be a sink-filled DEM, since flow routing algorithms are used to define hydrological conectivity between cells.

element.name: PARAM
element.text: The layer with the parameter to use for the mean value uphill calculation.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: Values in this layer represents the mean value of all cells uphill of each one.
